medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started yesterday afternoon at 3:30 PM, described as achy and constant, located in the right upper abdomen and epigastrium. It began about 2 hours after eating and was relieved with Dilaudid. The patient also reported slight nausea and difficulty taking a deep breath.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HTN, Hypothyroid, Hyperlipidemia, Depression, GERD, Gout, Allergic Rhinitis, Asthma.
